title: Ryze (5.8) with Rylai's
body:
I was thinking, because Ryze's new Q is now long ranged and still single target, it would make his Qs slow, which makes him kite super well.

Any thoughts?

EDIT: Maybe with Enhancement: Furor as well?

replies.body: it might work, but only if you are going glass canon serps/rod/deathcap/voidstaff/ryalis, but didn't they nerf his ratios?
They buffed his Q AP ratio but nerfed its Mana ratio, and they nerfed his other abilities' ratios as well
You're better off pressing R (which is up most of the time now anyway) and kiting back.
